text: Damien Burroughs (born 28 October 1978) is an Australian disabled athlete. He was born in West Union, Ohio, in the United States. He won a gold medal at the 1996 Summer Paralympics in the Men's Discus F36. He competed but did not win any medals at both the 2000 and 2004 Summer Paralympics. == References == Category:Australian athletes Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Australia Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics
title: Damien Burroughs
